thread.title: The Andersons, Inc. Declares Cash Dividend for the Second Quarter

author: cnbc.com
title: The Andersons, Inc. Declares Cash Dividend for the Second Quarter
text:
MAUMEE, Ohio, Feb. 23, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- The Andersons, Inc. (Nasdaq: ANDE) announces a second quarter 2018 cash dividend of 16.5 cents ($0.165) per share payable April 23, 2018, to shareholders of record on April 2, 2018.
This is The Andersons' 86th consecutive quarterly cash dividend since listing on the Nasdaq on February 20, 1996. There are approximately 28.2 million common shares outstanding.
About The Andersons, Inc.
Founded in Maumee, Ohio, in 1947, The Andersons is a diversified company rooted in agriculture, conducting business across North America in the grain, ethanol, plant nutrient and rail sectors. For more information, visit The Andersons online at www.andersonsinc.com .
View original content with multimedia: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/the-andersons-inc-declares-cash-dividend-for-the-second-quarter-300603451.html
SOURCE The Andersons, Inc.
